title: ICI la France: Les Lyceens chez eux
creator_credit: Associated Television, Donald Carter and Mary Glasgow
brief_description: French language training film - all dialogue is in French. A visit to the modern Lycee at Enghien where the curriculum includes practical work, a lot of sport and where the pupils can pursue their own chosen activities such as painting as well as participating in the organisation of the school through an elected committee. Several pupils and teachers are introduced and a lesson Ronsard is shown.
